name: Doctor & Plague
description:
SYNOPSIS:

France, year 16xx
A stranger enters a tavern. A plague doctor invites him to play a card game based upon his work of fighting against the spread of the Black Death.

CONTROLS:

  • E: Switches the vision between deck and table.
  • Mouse to select the options

HOW TO PLAY:
